input.sentences: she found a small turtle at the edge of the shore .
her mother told her to put it back in the rocks .
she had on her favorite pink coat .
watching her climb over the large rocks brought a smile to her mothers face .
she knelt down on one rock and proclaimed to her mother that she had named it turtle rock .
output.sentences: Betty found a turtle on the shore.
Mother told her to set the turtle on the rocks.
Betty looked a bit defiant in her favorite pink coat.
She listened though and sat on the rocks watching the turtle with a smile.
Finally she couldn't take it any longer and stood on the rock and proclaimed that she was taking the turtle home.
